body: Hi Marta, It´s working for me (and for you the same way), your problem is the occupancy , try it with normal working hours 8:00 to 17:00 and you will see the difference.  I know you have a apartment house so the problem of low DA % is that  people are never there when the sun is up, so therefore they need to use always artificial light.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/xe-ETyWEowOPKrDT3WnPbZ9rzDG5dsNcs7vZdYxN*RjxANzDmHX9TiZXzpd2CxO1q5JbosND8QE7UiNVLqkRP6IVb28VYqT8/1_tst.jpg)
